channel.title: Need help with misc in a certain shop
channel.description:
Sup everybody.. Im having a problem with one of my shops. This shops sells d claws d full plate etc. but the misc for all of those items are 0. How do I make it so theres like 1 or 10..
http://s1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc422/Cr4ckh34dxxx/?action=view&current=Shop.png
^ theres the pic.. please help im a new coder so I dnt know a lot :confused:

item.title: Need help with misc in a certain shop
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

go into your shops.cfg and find that shop. and see what the number is next to those items id’s. if the number next to it then there is yourproblem. just change it to however many you want in the shop and your good. let me know if that was it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with misc in a certain shop
